text: Mackenzie Davis (born April 1, 1987) is a Canadian actress. From 2014 to 2017, she starred as computer programmer Cameron Howe in the television series Halt and Catch Fire."Mackenzie Davis on her Black Mirror tech fears and Blade Runner reboot". Toronto Star, November 1, 2016. Page E4. Cassandra Szklarski. She also co-starred in the "San Junipero" episode of the television series Black Mirror. In 2019, she starred as the super-soldier Grace in Terminator: Dark Fate. ==References== Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian stage actors Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Actors from Vancouver
title: Mackenzie Davis
